      • joinGame

        void joinGame(int gameID)
        Method to add a player to a game, adds the player to the other gameExtended object, on the other clients and server. retrive a gameExtended and use it to build the GUI. Couple this method to the buttons in the tableview in the lobby
        Parameters:
        gameID - The game you want to join

      • watchGame

        void watchGame(int gameID)
        Method to add a watchter a game. Method is couple to the button in the tableview of the games
        Parameters:
        gameID - The id of the game you want to watch
